original_title: USA Hospital "Systems" Are Completely Corrupted & Run By WEF-CCP Aligned Globalists -      _  Choosing Where You Go & WHO You Choose for Health Care Is a Life & Death Decision      __ YES - They Really ARE Out to Get YOU!  — The Donald
article_summary: "User shares personal experiences of subpar healthcare in the US, highlighting issues with negligent staff, insurance denials, and pressure to receive certain treatments. They emphasize the importance of being vigilant and proactive when seeking medical care."</s>
